title: Generative AI-Enabled Design Creation Workshop: Language-Based Character Design Through Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: While learners are beginners in the language domain, they possess self-directed learning abilities as adult learners. Provides an asynchronous collaborative learning environment using online discussion boards and AI tools.

learning_goals: Create three or more language-based character design prototypes using generative AI tools
Critically analyze AI-generated outputs and integrate findings into design decision-making processes
Develop design solutions combining entertainment/aesthetic elements using experiential learning frameworks

resources: AI-based feedback system within the LMS

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
